home.heroTitle: Solar Energy for Your Home & Business
home.aboutText: Influx Solar has been providing sustainable solar energy solutions since 2021. Based in Wardha, Maharashtra, we are committed to delivering high-quality solar installations for homes and businesses.

services.title: Our Services
subsidyDetails: On-grid solar panels: Clean, affordable, and efficient.
Maharashtra State Electricity Distribution Company (MSEB) approved on-grid system.
Free net metering and one-night warranty.
No need to pay electricity bills, save up to 90%.
Solar panels come with a 24 to 30-year warranty.

processDescriptions.consultation: We assess your energy needs and site conditions to determine the best solar solution.
processDescriptions.design: Our team designs a custom solar system tailored to your property and energy goals.
processDescriptions.installation: Professional installation with minimal disruption, ensuring safety and quality at every step.
processDescriptions.activation: We connect and test your system to ensure it's running at optimal performance.
processDescriptions.support: Ongoing maintenance and support to keep your solar system performing at its best.

faqs.installationTime: How long does solar installation take?
faqs.installationTimeAnswer: A typical residential installation takes 1-3 days depending on system size and complexity.
faqs.panelLifespan: What is the lifespan of solar panels?
faqs.panelLifespanAnswer: Most solar panels have a lifespan of 25-30 years with equivalent warranty coverage.
faqs.subsidiesAvailable: Are there any government subsidies available?
faqs.subsidiesAvailableAnswer: Yes, many areas offer subsidies and tax incentives for solar installation. We can guide you through these options.
